title: The One Reason
description: Love will find you, and then your story begins . . . When what should have been one of the best nights of his life takes a turn, seventeen-year-old Elvis Sullivan, who always seems to run into trouble, finds himself in a situation where he has no choice but to act bravely. A girl's life falls into his hands and, in the face of fear, Elvis becomes her only saving grace. For years after that tragic night, in spite of all his attempts to forget what happened, he can never get the girl out of his memory, not knowing if she survived. The magic of fate proves itself in serendipity, revealing that, even when you're broken, love is the one reason to believe in. www.odilerose.com
author: Odile Rose
